
# mopay 
![mopay](https://static.openfintech.io/vendors/mopay/logo.png?w=400&c=v0.59.26#w200)  

## General 
 
**Code:** `mopay` 
 
**Name:** 
 
:	[EN] mopay 
 
**Status:** `active` 
 
**Description:** 
 
: [EN]  mopay is a global leader in innovative payment solutions for online merchants. mopay’s core platform enables merchants of virtual, digital and physical goods to bill charges directly to consumers’ cell phone and landline accounts. mopay operates in more than 80 countries across the globe, reaching more than 4.3 billion consumers. The company has a blue-chip customer base including major brands such as Gameforge, Bigpoint, Valve and Wargaming. mopay has more than 100 employees at locations in the United States, Germany, Austria, Spain, the United Kingdom, Korea, Vietnam, Indonesia, China, Romania and Brazil.
